title: Removing a working set immediately makes changes
description: When a working set is removed, the changes are applied immediately.
OB: 1. Create a working set with one project and select it. The package view is filtered. 2. [Additional steps not provided]
EB: 1. Create a working set with one project and select it. The package view is filtered. 2. Open the working set dialog again and create a second working set. 3. Delete the first working set.
